tool_description: An API showing links to all the latest articles about Bitcoin.
name: Bitcoin Articles Live
title: Bitcoin Articles Live

api_list.name: Search all bitcoin news
api_list.description: Returns the news for which the titles match a search pattern given as parameter of the query.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoin-articles-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/search/money"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoin-articles-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoin-articles-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/search/{searchpattern}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bitcoin-articles-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Bitcoin news
api_list.description: This endpoint returns a json array containing  titles and links to Bitcoin articles.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bitcoin-articles-live.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
